Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Nubs has an 18 inch groomed in hardpack  base . Today a fresh groom of new snow made for hero skiing . It was cold : but LF 6 made it work . And the wind was light . Excellent !

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Delightful ski at 445 pm. Skated on Coyote, Cedar Trace, Contractor's loop twice and the connector loop to south parking.  When they are viable for skating, I prefer the grooming conditions and connectors with less traffic to Bucks Run. My heart sang when I realized Cedar Trace was groomed as it is my favorite area to skate ski at HM...and it feels like too many years since possible.  Maybe some tall grass sticking up along Coyote but no pavement, maybe some ridges to navigate but if you were light on your feet/attentive, it was all quite good.Saw the largest buck I've seen in quite some time jump across the Contractor's Loop at 543 pm (sunset) and numerous females.Thank YOU to the groomer(s) and to the Metroparks staff & leadership for making this a priority.

Stoney Creek Metropark (Shelby Township).conditions: Almost all trails have fresh park set tracks, but exposed areas were sometimes drifted over. There are some oak leave patches in the woods where deer have been digging for acorns. Despite these issues skiing was the best I've seen at Stoney in a long time,

nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails were power-tilled and tracked on Tuesday morning. Conditions are very good.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday thru Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 p.m.
nubsNob.comments: Yesterday's snow is now groomed into the base and the ski surface is exceptional. Sustained cold and frequent fresh snow continues to make conditions remarkably good at Nub's Nob. The majority of the snow is machine groomed today but powder can still be discovered in certain areas like the Tower Glades. Pintail Peak lodge is open with food service and an espresso bar. The lifts will spin from 9:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m. with an hour break at 4:30 p.m. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
